mapper.select: select sum(subs_pay_amount) as substotal from subsinfo where to_char(subs_rdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') between to_char(#{date1},'yyyy-MM-dd') and to_char(#{date2},'yyyy-MM-dd')
select sum(pay_amount) as itemtotal from item_order where to_char(order_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') between to_char(#{date1},'yyyy-MM-dd') and to_char(#{date2},'yyyy-MM-dd')
